title: Change device type to a Cover time-based

user.title: Create a Cover time-based from other entities
user.description: Pick two switches or lights that you want to show up in Home Assistant as a cover. The original entities will be hidden.

data_description.name: Name of the new cover to create.
data_description.up: Entity that will open the cover.
data_description.down: Entity that will close the cover.
data_description.stop: Entity that will stop the cover movement.
data_description.slats_opening_time: Time in seconds it takes to fully open the slats
data_description.slats_closing_time: Time in seconds it takes to fully close the slats
